content: Setup React project with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS configuration
Create project structure and organize components (pages, components, hooks, types, utils)
Implement Header component with logo and navigation (as seen in screenshots)
Create Home/Landing page component matching the design from screenshot 1
Build About page with content sections as shown in screenshot 2
Implement Results explanation page with love language descriptions (screenshot 3)
Build Quiz component with question flow, progress bar, and navigation
Implement Quiz state management (Redux/Context API) for answers and results
Create Results component to display quiz outcomes with scoring logic
Style all components using Tailwind CSS to match the blue/teal theme
Implement responsive design for mobile and desktop views
Add routing with React Router for navigation between pages
Implement accessibility features (ARIA labels, keyboard navigation)
Add animations and transitions for better user experience
Write unit tests for quiz logic and components
